"Your Mag":

For instance, its \"Active Sonar\" feature helps you detect undiscovered Cocoons and Towers.

You can show or hide your Mag by selecting \"Equipment/Palette\" from the Main Menu, then selecting \"Mag\"."

"On this menu, you can also use special devices to change the appearance of your Mag.
